title: Best of The Herd for Mar 06, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 06, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb filling in for Colin


The Clippers are the guys in Ocean's 11 taking their plan step by step

LeBron does care about the MVP and saying he doesn't is misleading

The Angel and the Devil pitch Tom Brady on why he should and shouldn't join each team interested


Guest: Chris Broussard, Fox Sports NBA Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
